tool_description: The Cat Info API provides comprehensive information about various cat breeds and colors. From Abyssinian to York Chocolate, explore detailed descriptions, average height and weight, and personality traits for each breed. Additionally, discover the characteristics of different coat colors, from solid black to tri-color tortoiseshell. Perfect for cat enthusiasts, breeders, and anyone curious about feline companions!
name: Cat Info API
title: Cat Info API

api_list.name: GET Cat Colors
api_list.description: Provides information on all cat fur coat colors
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cat-info-api.p.rapidapi.com/colors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cat-info-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET Cat Breeds
api_list.description:
Returns all the information on cat breeds.

1. Name
2. Average Height
3. Average Weight
4. Description
5. Personalities
api_list.code:

url = "https://cat-info-api.p.rapidapi.com/breeds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
